opinion: Order stuff off the menu if you dont see what you want. They can do a lot more than whats listed on the menu.
The best Thai food Ive had in Orange County
The order took about 15 minutes to get done
extensive menu, but strangely missing some standards green curry, red curry
not much kick in the sauces as served, though I didnt ask for any special spiciness level
too many Thai food places in OC that, taste way better
